rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: An open, inviting foyer leading into the duplex. It features a traditional Chettinad style with intricate woodwork and stone accents.

vastu.notes: Ensure entry is free of clutter for positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area with Chettinad architectural details and comfortable seating arrangement. It opens to the balcony.

vastu.notes: Placement promotes social interaction and prosperity.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Integrated dining area adjacent to the living room. The design includes traditional motifs.

vastu.notes: North is auspicious for dining spaces.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: A dedicated home theater with soundproof walls and ambient lighting. Designed to offer a cinematic experience.

vastu.notes: West ensures energy flow aligning with entertainment spaces.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern yet traditional kitchen with a Chettinad flavor. It includes dedicated storage and cooking areas.

vastu.notes: North placement is ideal for kitchens.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom with a private balcony offering natural light and ventilation. Decorated in Chettinad style with traditional elements.

vastu.notes: North-east is considered ideal for bedrooms.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Additional bedroom with a balcony and comfortable seating area.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated office space with minimalistic Chettinad design elements ensuring concentration and productivity.

vastu.notes: North is considered auspicious for workspaces.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Primary bathroom for ground floor. Features traditional fixtures.

vastu.notes: South-west is less ideal; consider ventilation to mitigate this placement.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: A grand door styled in Chettinad architecture that welcomes guests.

vastu.notes: Entrance aligned with south promotes positive energy entry.

openings.name: Balcony Door (Master Bedroom)
openings.description: Provides access to a private balcony offering serene views.

vastu.notes: North-east balconies help enhance natural lighting and air flow.

openings.name: Balcony Door (Guest Bedroom)
openings.description: Access door leading to a balcony for the guest room.

openings.name: Window Openings
openings.description: Strategically placed windows in living areas and bedrooms to promote cross ventilation and sunlight, adhering to Vastu principles.

levels.architectural_style: Chettinad duplex studio cottage with dedicated home theater, spacious balconies, and a home office on a 40x60 feet plot.
